metadata.name: Ischgl Shapes in White 2023 #1
metadata.description: The 1st ISCHGL NFT Collection "Shapes in White 2023" unites stunning snow sculptures as NFTs while granting access to the future Web3 community. Experience art, networking, and innovation in the digital winter world.

attributes.value: Premium Front Row VIP Access to Top of the Mountain Closing Concert on April 30th, 2023
Allowlist access, guarantees 1 free NFT from a future project with priority and limited-edition.
